text: Thota is an Indian surname used mostly by Reddy, chowdary (Kamma (caste)) and kapu caste people. These are so powerful castes in Telugu speaking states. This surname has roots in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, Tamil nadu and Maharashtra. It is an erstwhile zamindari surname, used by the Doras and Deshmukhs of Telangana and Andhra. People with this name include: * Thota Tharani, Indian film art director and production designer * Thota Vaikuntam, Indian painter * Thota Narasimham, is an Indian politician * Thota Thrimurthulu, Ex-MLA == See also == * Thotapalli or Thota Palli, a village in Vizianagaram district, Andhra Pradesh Category:Indian family names Category:Telugu-language surnames
title: Thota
